page.title: 04COMMUNITY SERVICE SCHEME
page.content: This year,75 of our 5th year pupils were involved in our scheme,helping 18 different "organisations" in the area and 10 different couples or individ- -uals in their own homes. In the 4th year our pupils helped a further 6 "organisations" and 3 couples on Thursday afternoons.As well as this we opened the Gleneagles Avenue Recreation Centre each Thursday afternoon from September to Easter and entertained some of the elderly residents from Valley House and the Wycliffe Home for the Blind. Our scheme is,without doubt,generating a lot of good will in the area and, for two years running,we have won awards in the National Westminster Bank's Project Respond scheme.In 1983/4 we won the first prize of Â£350 and in 1984/5 we won the second prize of Â£250.
